description.p: Extract the week number of the year from a date or datetime value.
Returns the week number of the year from a date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The Week function extracts the week number of the year from a date or datetime value.

example.caption: Week() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, Week(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|41
